page.title: 10HAILEY AREA - HOUSING
page.content: {SQUARES 3611 & 3610 The thatched Hailey Farm Cottage is a feature of{HOUSING}in the area. It is the oldest farm cottage in Herts., formerly owned by Mr.Bob Munser for many years. Hailey Lane has 26 houses (6 semi-detached), Hertford Road 20 houses, Chardingleve Farm 4 houses, Gypsy Lane 37 houses and Springle Lane 10 houses. Springle Ho. in Springle Lane was formerly a manor. It was sold 6 months ago (to the Simms family) because the residents were too elderly to cope with such a large house and moved to Aldeny. 'The Finches' (also in Springle Lane) has the only 'ingle- nook' fireplace left in Herts. and tarred weatherboarding. It is just outside the boundary of the Hoddesdon 'conduits{water}system'.
